Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2012 11:10PM tinajohnson34 wrote: I was just diagnosed with breast cancer. My oncologist has rushed all my test Echo, PET Scan and CT Scans. Just had port a cath put in. Very painful!!! My arm an shoulders hurts very bad. Had my 1st chemo treatment was sick for over 4 days. I have no energy and I am very depressed. I can not work. But, I dont know what to do??? I have 3 children that depend on me. No insurance!! I just applied for SSDI. Not sure I will get it. I am at a lost... I hope all is well with you now.
Posts.Title: SS turned me down tropicmom Chickadee
